verses.esv: 9 likewise also that women should adorn themselves in respectable apparel, with modesty and self-control, not with braided hair and gold or pearls or costly attire,
verses.kjv: 9 In like manner also, that women adorn themselves in modest apparel, with shamefacedness and sobriety; not with broided hair, or gold, or pearls, or costly array;
verses.niv: 9 I also want women to dress modestly, with decency and propriety, not with braided hair or gold or pearls or expensive clothes,

verses.esv: 22 When the camels had finished drinking, the man took a gold ring weighing a half shekel, and two bracelets for her arms weighing ten gold shekels,
verses.kjv: 22 And it came to pass, as the camels had done drinking, that the man took a golden earring of half a shekel weight, and two bracelets for her hands of ten shekels weight of gold;
verses.niv: 22 When the camels had finished drinking, the man took out a gold nose ring weighing a beka and two gold bracelets weighing ten shekels.

verses.esv: 3 Do not let your adorning be external—the braiding of hair and the putting on of gold jewelry, or the clothing you wear—
verses.kjv: 3 Whose adorning let it not be that outward adorning of plaiting the hair, and of wearing of gold, or of putting on of apparel;
verses.niv: 3 Your beauty should not come from outward adornment, such as braided hair and the wearing of gold jewelry and fine clothes.

verses.esv: 4 but let your adorning be the hidden person of the heart with the imperishable beauty of a gentle and quiet spirit, which in God’s sight is very precious.
verses.kjv: 4 But let it be the hidden man of the heart, in that which is not corruptible, even the ornament of a meek and quiet spirit, which is in the sight of God of great price.
verses.niv: 4 Instead, it should be that of your inner self, the unfading beauty of a gentle and quiet spirit, which is of great worth in God's sight.

verses.esv: 22 But the father said to his servants, ‘Bring quickly the best robe, and put it on him, and put a ring on his hand, and shoes on his feet.
verses.kjv: 22 But the father said to his servants, Bring forth the best robe, and put it on him; and put a ring on his hand, and shoes on his feet:
verses.niv: 22 "But the father said to his servants, 'Quick! Bring the best robe and put it on him. Put a ring on his finger and sandals on his feet.

verses.esv: 4 He answered, “Have you not read that he who created them from the beginning made them male and female, 5 and said, ‘Therefore a man shall leave his father and his mother and hold fast to his wife, and the two shall become one flesh’? 6 So they are no longer two but one flesh. What therefore God has joined together, let not man separate.”
verses.kjv: 4 And he answered and said unto them, Have ye not read, that he which made them at the beginning made them male and female, 5 And said, For this cause shall a man leave father and mother, and shall cleave to his wife: and they twain shall be one flesh? 6 Wherefore they are no more twain, but one flesh. What therefore God hath joined together, let not man put asunder.
verses.niv: 4 "Haven't you read," he replied, "that at the beginning the Creator 'made them male and female,' 5 and said, 'For this reason a man will leave his father and mother and be united to his wife, and the two will become one flesh'? 6 So they are no longer two, but one. Therefore what God has joined together, let man not separate."

verses.esv: 42 Then Pharaoh took his signet ring from his hand and put it on Joseph’s hand, and clothed him in garments of fine linen and put a gold chain about his neck.
verses.kjv: 42 And Pharaoh took off his ring from his hand, and put it upon Joseph’s hand, and arrayed him in vestures of fine linen, and put a gold chain about his neck;
verses.niv: 42 Then Pharaoh took his signet ring from his finger and put it on Joseph's finger. He dressed him in robes of fine linen and put a gold chain around his neck.

5   Trust in the LORD with all your heart,
    and do not lean on your own understanding.
verses.kjv: 5 Trust in the LORD with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding.
verses.niv: 5 Trust in the LORD with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding;

verses.esv: 18 “Everyone who divorces his wife and marries another commits adultery, and he who marries a woman divorced from her husband commits adultery.
verses.kjv: 18 Whosoever putteth away his wife, and marrieth another, committeth adultery: and whosoever marrieth her that is put away from her husband committeth adultery.
verses.niv: 18 "Anyone who divorces his wife and marries another woman commits adultery, and the man who marries a divorced woman commits adultery.

verses.esv: 24 Therefore a man shall leave his father and his mother and hold fast to his wife, and they shall become one flesh.
verses.kjv: 24 Therefore shall a man leave his father and his mother, and shall cleave unto his wife: and they shall be one flesh.
verses.niv: 24 For this reason a man will leave his father and mother and be united to his wife, and they will become one flesh.

verses.esv: 8 But you may write as you please with regard to the Jews, in the name of the king, and seal it with the king’s ring, for an edict written in the name of the king and sealed with the king’s ring cannot be revoked.”
verses.kjv: 8 Write ye also for the Jews, as it liketh you, in the king’s name, and seal it with the king’s ring: for the writing which is written in the king’s name, and sealed with the king’s ring, may no man reverse.
verses.niv: 8 Now write another decree in the king's name in behalf of the Jews as seems best to you, and seal it with the king's signet ring-for no document written in the king's name and sealed with his ring can be revoked."

verses.esv: 31 And as you wish that others would do to you, do so to them.
verses.kjv: 31 And as ye would that men should do to you, do ye also to them likewise.
verses.niv: 31 Do to others as you would have them do to you.

verses.esv: 30 As soon as he saw the ring and the bracelets on his sister’s arms, and heard the words of Rebekah his sister, “Thus the man spoke to me,” he went to the man. And behold, he was standing by the camels at the spring.
verses.kjv: 30 And it came to pass, when he saw the earring and bracelets upon his sister’s hands, and when he heard the words of Rebekah his sister, saying, Thus spake the man unto me; that he came unto the man; and, behold, he stood by the camels at the well.
verses.niv: 30 As soon as he had seen the nose ring, and the bracelets on his sister's arms, and had heard Rebekah tell what the man said to her, he went out to the man and found him standing by the camels near the spring.

verses.esv:
10    An excellent wife who can find?
    She is far more precious than jewels.
verses.kjv: 10 Who can find a virtuous woman? for her price is far above rubies.
verses.niv: 10 A wife of noble character who can find? She is worth far more than rubies.

verses.esv:
22   He who finds a wife finds a good thing
    and obtains favor from the LORD.
verses.kjv: 22 Whoso findeth a wife findeth a good thing, and obtaineth favour of the LORD.
verses.niv: 22 He who finds a wife finds what is good and receives favor from the LORD.

verses.esv: 2 And the king took off his signet ring, which he had taken from Haman, and gave it to Mordecai. And Esther set Mordecai over the house of Haman.
verses.kjv: 2 And the king took off his ring, which he had taken from Haman, and gave it unto Mordecai. And Esther set Mordecai over the house of Haman.
verses.niv: 2 The king took off his signet ring, which he had reclaimed from Haman, and presented it to Mordecai. And Esther appointed him over Haman's estate.

verses.esv: 8 Above all, keep loving one another earnestly, since love covers a multitude of sins.
verses.kjv: 8 And above all things have fervent charity among yourselves: for charity shall cover the multitude of sins.
verses.niv: 8 Above all, love each other deeply, because love covers over a multitude of sins.

verses.esv:
27   So God created man in his own image,
    in the image of God he created him;
    male and female he created them.
verses.kjv: 27 So God created man in his own image, in the image of God created he him; male and female created he them.
verses.niv: 27 So God created man in his own image, in the image of God he created him; male and female he created them.

verses.esv: 8 Anyone who does not love does not know God, because God is love.
verses.kjv: 8 He that loveth not knoweth not God; for God is love.
verses.niv: 8 Whoever does not love does not know God, because God is love.

verses.esv: 25 Husbands, love your wives, as Christ loved the church and gave himself up for her,
verses.kjv: 25 Husbands, love your wives, even as Christ also loved the church, and gave himself for it;
verses.niv: 25 Husbands, love your wives, just as Christ loved the church and gave himself up for her

verses.esv: 12 Rejoice in hope, be patient in tribulation, be constant in prayer.
verses.kjv: 12 Rejoicing in hope; patient in tribulation; continuing instant in prayer;
verses.niv: 12 Be joyful in hope, patient in affliction, faithful in prayer.

verses.esv: 9 What therefore God has joined together, let not man separate.”
verses.kjv: 9 What therefore God hath joined together, let not man put asunder.
verses.niv: 9 Therefore what God has joined together, let man not separate."

verses.esv: 7 Likewise, husbands, live with your wives in an understanding way, showing honor to the woman as the weaker vessel, since they are heirs with you of the grace of life, so that your prayers may not be hindered.
verses.kjv: 7 Likewise, ye husbands, dwell with them according to knowledge, giving honour unto the wife, as unto the weaker vessel, and as being heirs together of the grace of life; that your prayers be not hindered.
verses.niv: 7 Husbands, in the same way be considerate as you live with your wives, and treat them with respect as the weaker partner and as heirs with you of the gracious gift of life, so that nothing will hinder your prayers.

verses.esv: 14 And above all these put on love, which binds everything together in perfect harmony.
verses.kjv: 14 And above all these things put on charity, which is the bond of perfectness.
verses.niv: 14 And over all these virtues put on love, which binds them all together in perfect unity.

verses.esv: 8 For by grace you have been saved through faith. And this is not your own doing; it is the gift of God,
verses.kjv: 8 For by grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves: it is the gift of God:
verses.niv: 8 For it is by grace you have been saved, through faith--and this not from yourselves, it is the gift of God--
